company: Berkeley Academy Students In Computer Science (BASICS)
desc: Led a club of 20 middle and high school students aimed to inspire students to pursue careers in technology to positively impact and change their communities.
Planned and taught a dynamic introductory course on Scratch.
Organized and taught interactive programming workshops to a group of 15 middle-school girls from SOS Children's Villages, an NGO focused on supporting children without parental care.
Founded the first coding competition for middle school latinas in Costa Rica, acquired sponsorship from 5 renowned technology companies in the region.
Participated in a selective program to cultivate leadership potential and resources to impact Latinas locally and state-wide.
Attended a forum where I received guidance and coaching from different mentors on women empowerment, leadership, marketing, entrepreneurship, and networking.
